project.name: lib-ietf-paws
project.description:
Implementation of RFC 7545: Protocol to Access White-Space (PAWS) Databases
https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7545.txt
History v0.0.1 - first draft of implementation from RFC 7545; basic beans with annotation v0.1.0 - complete beans, add images to documentation v0.2.0 - add custom PawsChannel object, reorganize AVAIL_SPECTRUM_RESP to make it usable v0.2.1 - add timeRange field (EventTime object) to PawsChannel v0.2.2 - add fields second adj channel, query position, enforcement attribute v0.2.3 - add exception attribute to paws channel to indicate processing error v0.3.0 - upgrade JTS to 1.16.1 refctor to org.locationtech.jts v0.4.0 - rename project to from `lib-protocol-paws` to `lib-ietf-paws` 2019-07/26 v0.5.0 - refactor code into 'lib' package, add package-info to specify namespace v0.6.0 - add etsi and fcc enumerated types; rewrite device descriptor v0.7.0 - add PawsInfo class for information queries; extend AntennaCharacteristics v0.8.0 - update DeviceOwner to use LDAP distinguished names instead of VCARD format v0.9.0 - add Ised device descriptor for Canada operation v0.10.0 - update element vs. attribute use; use TreeSet to ensure proper sorting v0.11.0 - add spectrum use; registration; validation request and response messages
